name: FileSystem
description: Input used to read data from files stored in a Hadoop-compatible monitored filesystem directory (that is: HDFS, S3, NFS, etc.)

properties.tooltip: Path to an file located in a compatible filesystem (HDFS, S3, Azure, etc). If the file is located in the HDFS used in the tenant configuration one can specify the path omitting the connection details.
